Solver Configuration.Name: Sample Count
Solver Configuration.Description: Specifies the number of samples (parameters) to evaluate per generation (preferably 5-10x number of variables).

Solver Configuration.Name: Crossover Rate
Solver Configuration.Description: Controls the rate at which dimensions from samples are mixed (must be in [0,1]).

Solver Configuration.Name: Mutation Rate
Solver Configuration.Description: Controls the scaling of the vector differentials (must be in [0,2], preferably < 1).

Solver Configuration.Name: Mutation Rule
Solver Configuration.Description: Controls the Mutation Rate: 'Fixed' or 'Self Adaptive' (udpating rule in [Brest2006]).

Solver Configuration.Name: Parent Selection Rule
Solver Configuration.Description: Controls the selection of the parent vecor: 'Random' or 'Best' (best sample from previous generation).

Solver Configuration.Name: Accept Rule
Solver Configuration.Description: Sets the sample accept rule after mutation and evaluation: 'Best', 'Greedy', 'Iterative' or 'Improved'.

Solver Configuration.Name: Fix Infeasible
Solver Configuration.Description: If set true, Korali samples a random sample between Parent and the voiolated  boundary. If set false, infeasible samples are mutated again until feasible.

Termination Criteria.Name: Max Generations
Termination Criteria.Description: Determines how many solver generations to run before stopping execution. Execution can be resumed at a later moment.

Termination Criteria.Name: Max Model Evaluations
Termination Criteria.Description: Determines how many computational model evaluations to run before stopping execution. Execution can be resumed at a later moment.

Termination Criteria.Name: Max Resamplings
Termination Criteria.Description: Max number of mutations per sample per generation if infeasible (only relevant if Fix Infeasible is set False).

Termination Criteria.Name: Min Value
Termination Criteria.Description: Specifies the target fitness to stop minimization.

Termination Criteria.Name: Max Value
Termination Criteria.Description: Specifies the target fitness to stop maximization.

Termination Criteria.Name: Min Value Difference Threshold
Termination Criteria.Description: Specifies the minimum fitness differential between two consecutive generations before stopping execution.

Termination Criteria.Name: Min Step Size
Termination Criteria.Description: Specifies the minimal step size of the sample mean from one gneration to another.

Variables Configuration.Name: Lower Bound
Variables Configuration.Description: Specifies the lower bound for the variable's value. Korali will not generate samples for which this variable falls below the specified minimum.

Variables Configuration.Name: Upper Bound
Variables Configuration.Description: Specifies the upper bound for the variable's value. Korali will not generate samples for which this variable falls below the specified maximum.

Internal Settings.Name: Previous Value Vector
Internal Settings.Description: Objection Function Values from previous evaluations.

Internal Settings.Name: Finished Sample Count
Internal Settings.Description: Counter of evaluated samples to terminate evaluation.

Internal Settings.Name: Best Sample Index
Internal Settings.Description: Index of the best sample so far.

Internal Settings.Name: Best Ever Value
Internal Settings.Description: Value of the best sample so far.

Internal Settings.Name: Previous Best Ever Value
Internal Settings.Description: Value of the previous best sample ever.

Internal Settings.Name: Best Ever Parameters
Internal Settings.Description: Parameters of the best sample ever.

Internal Settings.Name: Current Best Parameter
Internal Settings.Description: Parameter of the current best sample.

Internal Settings.Name: Max Distances
Internal Settings.Description: Max distance between samples per dimension.

Internal Settings.Name: Infeasible Parameter Count
Internal Settings.Description: Keeps count of infeasible sample re-evaluations so far.

Internal Settings.Name: Infeasible Parameter Count Change
Internal Settings.Description: Number of resamples in the current generation.

Internal Settings.Name: Current Minimum Step Size
Internal Settings.Description: Minimum step size of any variable in the current generation.
